title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 67.9 - Required amendatory endorsements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 67.9 - Required amendatory endorsements

State Regulations
(a) Every policy providing private passenger automobile physical damage insurance shall contain language that is substantially equivalent to the following: the insurer or its authorized representative has the right to inspect any private passenger automobile, including a nonowned automobile, insured or intended to be insured under this policy, before the automobile physical damage insurance shall become effective, except to the extent that this right is prescribed and limited by Insurance Regulation No. 79 (11 NYCRR Part
67
) or section
3411
of the Insurance Law. (b) When the insurer requires an inspection, the named insured shall cooperate and make the automobile available for inspection. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
67.9

Amended by

New

York State Register December 31, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 52, eff. 4/1/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
